This property verifies that the signal `bra_ex` is assigned to the value `2'h0` exactly one clock cycle after the reset signal `grst` is asserted.

The verification is triggered on every positive edge of the clock signal `gclk`. The antecedent condition is when the reset signal `grst` becomes 1. When this occurs, the consequent requires that on the next clock cycle, the signal `bra_ex` must equal `2'h0`.

The property is disabled and not checked when the reset signal `grst` is 0.
